name: Office Brawl (jimothius)
description:
CITA 280 Final Project: Office Brawl

by Alex Alsheimer, Marco Bresciani, Jimmy Cyganek, and Deon Goss.

You play as Phillip, an office drone broken by frustration of corporate life. When your boss fires you, and you find an extra-sharp pencil that gives you a few too many ideas, you and your coworker Wyatt set on a quest to defeat your boss once and for all.

The first step? Fighting a training dummy Wyatt just happens to have in his cubicle. (What an interesting man.)
